title: Problem with the new PROJECT Icons
body:
**Hello,**
Yesterday the new PROJECT contents were added to the game, which was awesome

I purchased Hyper Edge Icon (Katarina Icon {{champion:55}} ). I recieved the Icon and the augment core fragment, cores and Blueprint.
I then got my friend to gift me the Decrypter Icon, which contains the Ekko Icon. I received the Icon but did not get the augment core shard, PROJECT cores or the First Strike Blueprint for Ekko.

I then purchased the Ashe Icon and received the blue print, Augment cores and project cores.

I believe this is a possible bug with the gifting of these icons.

replies.body:
same thing happend to me!!!

so what now? 

does that mean we wont get them ever?
i dont have 3 blueprints, there is a bug
